title: Men Will Fall (4U161)
text:
Set:	The Two Towers
Kind:	Shadow
Culture:	Isengard
Twilight:	1
Card Type:	Event
Game Text:	Skirmish: Spot Saruman or an [Isengard] Man to make an unbound companion strength -2.
Lore:	”'The Ring of Barahir. So, Gandalf Greyhame thinks he has found Isildur's heir, the Lost King of Gondor… Fool! That line was broken years ago.'”
Rarity:	U
